name: Steam Momo
desc: Nepali style dumplings. Minced meat with garnish covered in a bun. Served with special Nepali tomato achaar (sauce).

name: Jhol Momo
desc: Nepali style dumplings served dipped in spicy soup

name: Chilli Momo
desc: Nepali style dumplings covered in spicy chilli sauce

name: Kothay Momo
desc: Nepali style dumplings lightly fried in a pan

name: Sadeko Momo
desc: Nepali style dumplings mixed with onions, chillies, cucumber, tomatoes garnished with corriander and lemon

name: Chowmein
desc: Fried noodles served with meat and vegetables

name: Thukpa
desc: Noodles served with a bowl of warm soup.
